snippet.title: The Novopangea Genesis Trailer
snippet.description:
Novopangea is an alternate reality storytelling adventure that has begun but is not yet finished where you control the narrative. By introducing you to an ownable storyline of dynamic possibilities, we have created a unique experience that gives the power of decision-making back to the community. And by taking residence in one of the six realms and immersing yourself in this "choose your own adventure" storyline, we aim to provide an empowering experience that might also give new perspectives on life in general. From the God lens to our hero's journey and back down to your chosen path, Novopangea creates choice while blurring the lines of fantasy and reality.

Learn more at https://novopangea.io
